original_title: 超恐怖体験第2話「吸血霊」
overview: J-Pop Girl Group Giri Giri Girls star in a series of low budget horror films, the second of the series focuses on a quiet town where a mysterious incident happens. What is the bloody history of this place and the legend of fresh blood sucking that drips from its history.
title: Super-Horror Experience 2: Vampire Spirit
